message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to our negotiation!
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm still being generous!
You're being too greedy, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not giving up yet!
Time's running out, Bob! I'm taking a firmer stance, but I'm still willing to listen.
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal. Don't think you're getting the better end of the stick!
